com.yahoo.prelude.templates

Class PageTemplateSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.prelude.templates.GenericTemplateSet
      • com.yahoo.prelude.templates.UserTemplate<XMLWriter>
        • com.yahoo.prelude.templates.DefaultTemplateSet
          • com.yahoo.prelude.templates.TiledTemplateSet
            • com.yahoo.prelude.templates.PageTemplateSet

  • public class PageTemplateSet
extends TiledTemplateSet
    A template implementing the 'page' format. This is a variant of the tiled template set - see that class for details.
    Author:
    bratseth

      • hit

        public void hit(Context context,
                XMLWriter writer)
         throws IOException
        Description copied from class: TiledTemplateSet
        Overrides UserTemplate.hit(Context, Writer) to print 'logging' type meta hits as /result/meta/provider tags. Fails back to super.hit(context, writer) in other cases.
        Overrides:
        hit in class TiledTemplateSet
        Parameters:
        context - wrapper which will contain, among other thing, the hit instance
        writer - the destination for rendering the hit
        Throws:
        IOException - may be propagated from the writer

      • hitFooter

        public void hitFooter(Context context,
                      XMLWriter writer)
               throws IOException
        Description copied from class: UserTemplate
        Render a footer for a single top level hit. A typical implementation may do nothing.

        The result set is available in the context object under the name "result". The hit itself as "hit", the index of the hit as "hitno", and all the fields under their normal names.

        Overrides:
        hitFooter in class DefaultTemplateSet
        Parameters:
        context - wrapper which will contain, among other thing, the hit instance
        writer - the destination for rendering the hit
        Throws:
        IOException - may be propagated from the writer
